get.summary: Retreive the status for the OpenLBDWS API as a text from http://realtime.nationalrail.co.uk/OpenLDBWSRegistration/.
Retrieve the details for a specific service given a service ID.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The id for the service that is to be retreived.

get.summary: Retrieve the details for a specific station board given a CRS code.

parameters.name: crs
parameters.description: A CRS short-code of the station. These codes can be found on National Rail Enquiries website.

parameters.name: departures
parameters.description: (Optional) Boolean stating whether departures are requested (Either departures or arrivals required).

parameters.name: arrivals
parameters.description: (Optional) Boolean stating whether arrivals are requested (Either departures or arrivals required).

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: (Optional) The destination as a CRS code where the service is going.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: (Optional) The origin as a CRS code where the service is coming from.

parameters.name: allFields
parameters.description: (Optional) Flag that states whether all additional fields will be returned.
